attributes.action: Set in motion the necessary actions to strip Sir Fred Goodwin of his knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, the poor benighted taxpayers and creditors of the big banks, would ask that the necessary actions are taken to strip the nefarious Sir Fred Goodwin the Greedy of his knighthood because, by reason of the arguments he is using to hang on to his ill-gotten gains of a pension in excess of £600,000 he is showing that he does not have the morals and character worthy of such an honour.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
